verses.content: Sinai tlângah LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,
“Israel thlahai hril la, an kuom- ah, ‘Ram ka pêk cheu in va tlung pha chun, ram chu LALPA hmingin a châwl ding a nih.
I loa chun kum ruk sûng chu thil chîng i ta, grêp huon chu kum ruk sûng chu sât der i ta, a ra suokhai sîk i ta;
a kum sari kum ruok chu ram châwl dêrna, LALPA hminga châwlna nîng a tih; i loa chun thlai i chîng ding a ni nawh a, i grêp huon khawm chu i sât der ding a ni bawk nawh.
I lohmaa amaa mâwng chu i sîk ding a ni nawh a, i enkawl naw grêp chu i lo ding a ni bawk nawh; ram châwl dêrna kum a ni ding a nih.
Ram châwl kum chun in fâkfâwm ding insuopêk a ti cheu a; i ta ding dâm, i siehlawpa le i siehlawnu ta ding dâm, i inhlawfa ta ding dâm, i kuoma khawsa ram dang mi ta ding dâm,
i bâwng ruol ta ding dâm, i rama ranhai ta ding dâm, chutaka a hung ra suok po po chu fâkfâwm ding nîng a tih.
“Chun, châwl kum kum sari tiem i ta, kum sari hmun sari nîng a ta, châwl kum kum sari sûng chu kum sâwmli pakuo nîng a ta.
Chu hnung thla sarina ni sâwm ni chun tawtawrâwt inringtak chu inmût vêltir i ta; intlanna nia chun in ram po poah tawtawrâwt in inmût vêltir ding a nih.

Chu kum sâwmngana chu inser thieng i ta, ram sûnga um po pohai kuomah zalênna thu in phuong ding a nih; in ta dingin jubili nîng a ta; mi tinin mâni ta ngai nei nâwk in ta; mi tin chu mâni insûng khur sengah in um nâwk ding a nih.
Chu kum sâwmngana chu in ta dingin jubili nîng a ta; iengkhawm chîng naw ti niu a, amaa mâwng khawm sîk bawk naw ti niu a, grêp enkawl naw ra chu in lo ding a ni bawk nawh.
Jubili a ni sih a; in ta dingin kum inthieng a ni ding a nih; inloa thil ra suok chu in fâk ding a nih.
Hi jubili kum hin mi tinin mâni ta ngei in chang nâwk seng ding a nih.
I tuolbâwm kuomah ieng ama- nih i zawr a, i tuolbâwma inthawkin ieng amanih în châwk khawma i hlêm ding a ni nawh;
jubili hnunga kum zât ang peiin i tuolbâwm thil chu inchâwng i ta, bu le bâl tam kum izirin i kuomah a zawr ding a nih.
A kum tam dân zir peiin a man chu sukpung i ta, a kum tlâwm dân zir peiin a man chu i suktlâwm ding a nih; lohma suok pung kum zirin i kuoma chun zawr a ni ding a nih.
In inhlêm ding a ni nawh a, in Pathien chu in ṭi ding a nih: kei hi LALPA in Pathien chu ka ni sih a.
“Chuleiin, ka thuruothai chu in zâwmin, ka rorêlhai chu in pawmin in ṭi ding a nih; chuongchun, chu rama chun thlamuongtakin in khawsa ding a nih.
Ram chun ra insuong a ta, tlaitakin chên in ta, thlamuongtakin in va khawsa ding a nih.
‘Iengkhawm kan chîng nawh a, thlai ra iengkhawm kan sîk naw bawk ding chun, kum sarina kum chun ieng am fâng kan ta?’ in ti a ni thei a;
a kum ruk kum chun ka malsâwmna in chungah intlungtir ka ta, kum thum sûnga ding chun ra insuong a tih.
Chun, a kum riet kum chun chîng in ta, thil ra suok in kawl, a hluihai chu fâng in ta, kum kuo kum chun, a hung thar nâwk chen chun, a hlui in kawlhai chu in fâk ding a nih.
“Kumkhuoa dingin ram chu zawr sawng ding a ni nawh, ram chu ka ta a ni sih a; ka kuoma khawsa mikhuol le khuolchâm el in ni sih a.
Chun, ram in hluo po poa chun, ram intlan in phal ding a nih.
“I unau chu hung pasein, a ram ṭhenkhat lo zawr sienla, a laibung bul takin a unauin a lo zawr chu a hung intlan ding a nih.
Chun, mîn intlanpêktu ding a nei nawh a, ama a hung khawsa thei a, intlanna ding khawp a hung nei chun,
a lo zawr china kum chu sut sienla, a zawrnapa kuoma chun a intêl chuong chu pe kîr raw se; chuongchun, a ram chu ama ma chun hluo nâwk a tih.
A ta dinga ân tlan kîr nâwk thei naw chun, a zawr ta chu jubili kum chenin ân chawtu kuta chun um raw se; chun, jubili kum chun suok nâwk a ta, ama chun a ram chu hluo nâwk a tih.
“Kul nei khuoah miin in a zawr chun, a zawra inthawka kum khat pumhlûm sûng intlan nâwk thei a tih; kum khat pumhlûm sûng chun intlan nâwk theina nei a tih.
Kum khat sûnga ân tlan nâwk thei naw chun, kul nei sûnga khuoa in chu, ân chawtu nei sawng dinga siem nîng a ta, a thlahai chena an ta ni tâng a ta, jubilia khawm suok chuong naw nih.
Kul nei naw khuoa inhai ruok chu, thingtlâng ram anga ngai nîng a ta, intlan nîng a ta, jubili chun insuo nîng an tih.
Amiruokchu, Levi mihai khuo, an chanpuola khuoa inhai chu Levi mihai chun ieng lai khawma intlan thei an tih.
Chun, Levi mihai laia miin ân tlan naw chun zawr tah in le, a chanpuol khuo chu jubilia chun suok a tih; Levi mihai khuoa inhai chu Israel thlahai laia an chanpuol a ni sih a.
An khaw kâwl vêla lohai ruok chu zawr thei ni naw nih, an kum- khaw chanpuol a ni sih a.
“Chun, i unau a hung paseh a, a hung bêl che chun i lo sawmdâwl ding a nih; mikhuol le khuolchâm i kuoma khawsa angin i umpui ding a nih.
A kuomah tangka amanih, thil amanih, a pung la naw rawh; Pathien ṭi lem rawh; i unau chu i kuoma a khawsak theina dingin.
A pung hnawtin i sum în pûktir ding a ni nawh a, a pung hnawtin i fâk ding lai hai khawm inpûktir naw rawh.
Kei hi LALPA in Pathien, Kanaan ram pe ding cheu le, in Pathien ni dinga Aigupta rama inthawka ṭhuoi suoktu cheu ka nih.
“I unau a hung paseh a, i kuoma a hung tlulût chun, suok angin i sawr ding a ni nawh a;
inhlawfa ang le i kuoma khawsa ve angin i umpui ding a nih; Jubili kum chen i rawng bâwl a ta;
chu zo chun i kuoma inthawkin suok a ta, ama le a nauhai leh; chun, anni sûngkuo pângngaia chun lût nâwk an ta, an pi le puhai in le lo an hluo nâwk ding a nih.
Aigupta rama inthawka ka ṭhuoi suok, ka siehlawhai an ni sih a, suok zawra zawr ding an ni nawh.
Rilotakin a chungah i um ding a ni nawh a, i Pathien chu i ṭi ding a ni lem.
Suoknu le suokpaa i nei ding chu: in vêla hnam laia mi, suoknu le suokpa ding chun în châwk ding a nih.
Chun, nangni laia khawsa ram dang mihai le, in rama pieng an sûng- hai laia mi khawm inchaw thei bawk in tih; anni chu in thilnei hung nîng an tih.
Chun, nangni hnunga in nauhai ro hluo sâwng thilah siem in ta; chuonghai chu in kumkhaw suok dingin siem thei in ta; amiruokchu, in unau Israel thlahai laia ruok chun rilotakin in um ding a ni nawh.

“Ram dang mi amanih, i kuoma khawsa tu amanih a hung hausa a, a kuoma i unaupa a hung paseh a, i kuoma ram dang mi kuoma manih, i kuoma khawsa kuoma manih, ram dang mi thlahai kuoma manih a tlu lût chun,
a tlûk lût hnung khawma intlan thei nîng a ta, a unauhai laia miin intlan thei a tih.
A pamiin amanih, a pami naupân amanih intlan thei a tih; a chihai laia a laibung hnaiin amani khawm intlan thei a tih; chun, ama khawm a hung hausa chun ama le ama chu intlan thei a tih.
A tlûk lûtnapa leh a tlûk lûta inthawka jubili kum nâwk ding sût hmunkhat hai sienla, a tlûk lût man chu a kum zir nîng a ta; chun, in- hlawfa a ruoi sûtpêk ang peia sûtpêk nîng a tih.
Kum tamtak a la bâk chun, a la bâk zât hu chu sûtin, ama inchâwkna mana inthawkin let kîr nîng a ta.
Jubili kum tlungna ding kum tlâwmte chau um a ni chun, sût hmunkhat hai sienla, a sinthaw ding la bâk kum izirin, ân tlanna dingin tangka chu a pêk kîr ding a nih.
Kum khat bi peia ruoi inhlawfa angin a bêl ding a na; i mithmua chun rilotakin a thaw ding a ni nawh.
Chuong ang zâwnga intlan a ni naw khawma, jubili kum chun suok a ta, ama le a nauhai leh.
Israel thlahai chu keima sie- hlawhai an ni sih a, Aigupta rama inthawka ka ṭhuoi suok, ka sie- hlawhai an nih: Kei hi LALPA in Pathien chu ka nih.
